22.review_text: Was so impressed with Asoke residence hotel. Great service from lovely staff Kaewta a manager of front desk and upgraded to bigger room. Room clean with big size. Swimming pool is good but no time for it. Easy to walk to BB building for my work and closed to MRT by 5 mins walks.

23.review_text: •The room are very clean and beautiful • The staff always smiling and always to help you in your activities in a natural way.  A team really at your service to advise you also.  • Great Breakfast  • Nice place for fitness also  • An incredible experience with a great dynamic staff.    Very close to:   -MRT - Shopping mall ( only one station from the MRT station)  -Starbucks coffee - 7/11 - Market   - Pharmacy

24.review_text: Thanks for every staff during we had checked up in hospital for helping and take care room. A place very nice to stay like home and feel comfy good transportation and good room service we admire everyone in here Especially Mr. Ping  staff very good service Helping us every time . Thank you so much for this kindness hotel

25.review_text: We had a long haul stay here. The executive rooms are definitely the way to go, those lower are cramped. The staff are exceptionally friendly and helpful especially at restaurant and front desk. One downside is the restaurant closed after lunch, but there are plenty of eating options nearby or on Grab. A second downside is - and noticed this because we stayed for 3 weeks - the cleaning of rooms is actually very light and minimal, and I’d hope they’d do actual cleaning of washrooms etc than just a light moo point of the floor. Recommend if you are looking for a midrange place to stay.

26.review_text: We loved our stay in this wonderful hotel with a renovated, beautiful and quiet room. Check in and check out was effortless. All our concerns were perfectly taken care of by Mr A. Thank you. We'll be back.

27.review_text: Just had a great stay in the Asok residence sukhumvit. Been there for a couple of days, rooms are nice, spacious bathroom (sometime little bad smell out of the drain.. minus 1 :), breakfast was good, all you need (western and thai options), wifi was fast (occasional ping swings). Staff was amazing, kind, helpfull, courteous. Thank you guys.

28.review_text: This is my second review for this excellent hotel but I'm still writing a review about it because there's nowhere else near it in terms of excellence. you will never find a location that is better than here if you want to explore the city. the hotel is just right in the middle near the central intersection of bangkok where you will see the most crowd crossing the street during rush hour

29.review_text: Had fun staying here!! We were supposed to stay here only for a nyt, but end up extending it day after day since everyone here were so friendly and accomodating. Special thanks to Fami, K, the bellboy, and the rest of the gang for making our stay smooth and easy.  Hotel rooms are clean, bed is soft and comfy, they have complete amneties at each room. Dental kit, toiletries, blower, microwave, kettle, tv, safety box.   Easy access to BTS, walking distance to 7 11 and shopping center, everything is within reach actually. No need to ride a cab.  We'll surely go back!!! Staying here feels home.  Thank you guys

30.review_text: The hotel staff are very friendly especially fami and k..they are very helpful to us. The hotel rooms are very nice and clean. And the location is very accessible.I will definitely check in here again.

31.review_text: I stayed only 2 nights:  Once I got down my car, Staff(Name:A) suddenly helped I and my friend hold the big suitcase and he was so politely and friendly as well. After I checked in, I fortunately got a upgraded room with on charge.  So perfect service & affordable room, I think I will be back if I have an opportunity.

32.review_text: I stayed at this hotel for 3 momths and I absolutely enjoyed my stay, the hotel room is great, the staff including Film are absolutely kind and caring, its a wonderful hotel in the centre of alot of great stores, the services at this hotel are excellent, I'd definitely recommend this place to stay at.

33.review_text: I have been there 2 weeks. The location in asoke is excellent. The room are very well furnished. The bathroom are excellent. cleaning was very efficient et flexible. The rooftop solarium with an amazing view on the city is a big plus.  But the most important, the people working in the hotel were lovely, specially jay, Kay and Char at the reception.they made me feeling at home.  Amazing stay.

34.review_text: The location is extremely convenient to me. The hotel is a walking distance to MRT and a good local food market nearby. My stay was luckily upgraded to a family suite due to an unfortunate event related to the elevator. The staff is very thoughtful offering us the family suite. During our stay, Khun Ping is outstanding among other staff. He was very nice and kind to my family. He was so helpful and thoughtful. I will surely visit this hotel again.

35.review_text: It was the best hotel i have been in Bangkok (i have been in 7 hotels here), very close to everything in the downtown (restaurants,malls,metro at 5 minutes by walking).The staff was very friendly and helpful notably Khao (the staff manager) and Film. Also the price is very attractive for the size of the room (i got an 50m2 appartment for less than 800 baths per night with breakfast included).  Very confortable and clean place also. I really recommand to stay there during your trip in Bangkok.

36.review_text: I enjoyed my stay in this place! Location is a big plus (close to MRT and also the Asoke pier). The stuff was very friendly and helpful. Rooms are clean too. Gym is Little but it was enough for my needs.

37.review_text: Visited Hotel Asoke Residence Sukhumvit early January 2020. Even though the hotel is at the end of a small alley, it doesn’t feel sleazy or unsafe. The location is quite good as it is within walking distance to public transport, in addition there are many food establishments nearby. Special thanks to Ms Kaew. She speaks good English and is very helpful. Helped me to communicate with the grab driver as the driver lost his way and could only speak Thai. Such warmth service definitely warrant more visits from me and my family.

38.review_text: Room  prices is good as area and view great location  reception staff name Miss Kaew are great person good service also can use restuarant  any time can order also have swimming pool also play land small for baby

39.review_text: It can be quite a distance from the nearest metro; 10-15min walk. A rather older establishment. Shower was little cramped. Otherwise, worth what you're paying for. 30-40min walk to Asok (Terminal 21) if you're keen on clocking those steps.  Otherwise, bustling area with lots of food options as with most places in the city.

40.review_text: My first time for this hotel. Im really happy with price, service.  Thank you to Manager and GM for your support. Thank you all of housekeeping. Thank you u guys for taking care of us. Defiantly to come back and make a contract to stay here.

41.review_text: I liked my room which was spacious and had good views from 2 sides and 2 small balconies. It was spacious and had a kitchenette . The bed was comfortable and I slept well. The breakfast was particularly good and when I go back there next month I shall order their egg Benedict again. The location is very good and just a short walk from Phetchaburi MRT station. I have just one slightly negative thing to say and that is from the moment I walked into reception on arrival it didn’t have the feel of a 4* hotel. No matter, I would recommend it anyway.

42.review_text: A is a very kind person and his service is really good. This is the first time I go to Thailand and he taught me how to use grab to taxi out. The location of the hotel is really good. It is in the center of Bangkok.

43.review_text: I really recommend this hotel.  People are so nice and kind at the reception. Specially Kay who helps me a lot ! They are offering lots of services. The room is clean, and all the necessary is inside.  And the food in the restaurant is delicious. I will come back here for sure.

44.review_text: The hotel is in a excellent location. The staff were super friendly and helpful (honestly some of the nicest hotel staff I have seen during my travels). The room was bigger than expected, and very very clean. I will definitely book again here the next time I'm in Bangkok.

45.review_text: I was staying on the first floor, and visited the front desk many times for some support.   They were always in a good mood and very very supportive and helpful.   Especially the front desk Kay and Mono (of course others too). They have arranged me a few things to help my business-related matters.   Thank you for great support!  I’ll revisit here when I stay in Bangkok.   Great price, location, clean facility and excellent service!

46.review_text: Reasonable price with premium good quality service standard with good room atmosphere environment among Asoke area. The staff name ‘A’ is very good person with good service mind. He helped me a lot. Thank you

47.review_text: Asoke Residential Sukhunvit BY UHG I only stayed the one night and found the hotel to be satisfactory but not much more than that. The staff are friendly as in you are greeted with a wye or a smile. I booked the cheapest room which was rather small there was no desk to work from no doors on the wardrobe; it did have a safety deposit box though. The double bed is very comfortable but it was up against the wall so the person sleeping there would have to exit the bed at the bottom assuming there are two of you sleeping in it. The furniture consisted of one small settee and a small coffee table and that’s your lot. But as the saying goes you get what you pay for. The bathroom was again small with a wash basin and a very small cupboard beneath to store things. There was a rain shower…

48.review_text: Reception Service was very Good.  Room Service was Very Good.  Breakfast manu was ok.  Hotel Manager Service was very Good.  Room decoration is good.  Kitchen is good.  Hotel staff are very good.   We will come again and we will suggest to friends for staying in Asoke residence.

49.review_text: Nice and clean - the service was lovely. Free upgrade and the room was quiet and shower was great. Great location near the stations (it really makes a difference because it takes so long to walk everywhere with the traffic).  Would stay again - good for a couple of days in a busy city!

50.review_text: Enjoyed our stay. Location not far off from everything. Be prepared for booking transport or you have to walk a bit to the places you wanna go. Pool isn't for swimming but good to just chill out. Breakfast is considered good for the price you pay

51.review_text: Very good location, the room is big and very confortable. The breakfast : lot of choices but the quality could be better.  Spécial Thanks to A Who was really helpfull specially for booking taxi ! Thanks

52.review_text: We were guests of this structure for 3 nights and everything was very welcome, the food, the breakfasts and all together turned our stay into something unique. the residence is located in the heart of bkk easy to reach. Impeccable cleanliness of the rooms I thank all the staff very kind smiling and professional. A special greeting to the girl who works on the 4th floor, always polite smiling. I recommend this place to everyone and we will definitely be back

53.review_text: Was worried a little bit about having to pay early check in fine but not only did I not have to pay it — i got a free room upgrade 🙃  Staff was nice and helpful and the room was decent too so overall not a bad place to stay at if you’re on a budget.

54.review_text: We have stayed here before so for us to be back it must be right. We used it as a base - 3 days exploring Bangkok then a few days in Cambodia and Vietnam and then back to this hotel for 3 more days/nights in Bangkok - easy to explore from here. Not the most modern of hotels and quite small, but just what we needed. Staff always helpful and attentive.

55.review_text: Location is just arround 250 m close to metro, boats and air rail link. Rooms are very clean and we had all we need.They grade up our room free of charge Breakfest is excellent.Many options you can try. 7/11 is just next to them. Staff is very helpfull with full of respect. We will stay at same place next time :)

56.review_text: I have actually stayed here on two separate occasions and it does not disappoint. Staff is very helpful and the rooms were very clean. It does seem to be an older building but it does have charm to it. It is within walking distance of a lot of convenience stores and a really good food market. Also a 5 minute walk from the train station which was our preferred mode of transportation.

57.review_text: Stayed here for a solo trip. The location is great as it is near popular spots, also has a lot of food options in the area. It’s not too crowded too, which is great.  The staff are very accommodating and helpful.  The room is very spacious, comfortable and clean.

58.review_text: It is close to transport hubs, pier/subway/airport link. My room was of decent size with good shower and aircon. The service was attentive and I want to especially mention Nu at the reception who arranged a car for my day tour at a reasonable price.

FuramaXclusive Sathorn Hotel, Bangkok.address: 59, Soi Silom 3, Silom Road Silom, Bang Rak, Bangkok 10500 Thailand

1.review_text: Convenient location, suitable accommodation. The air-con is pretty noisy. During this complicated time of COVID19, this hotel suffers from the comparison with other similarly priced hotels though. I'd say it is an OK choice for a short stay, with nothing particularly outstanding. I would consider alternative places with better facilities and service for longer stays.

2.review_text: This is not new hotel, but in very-very good condition. Huge room, absolutely clean. Nice location - 2 BTS Skytrain stations in walking distance. Silom Night Market and Patpong Night Market 12-15 minutes calm walking. A lot of street food places, restaurants and 7-11 around. Only smiles at the reception ) 2 bottles of free water. Lunch buffet for 89 THB is attracting many many people, so come earlier! Choice is good, food is tasty and typical Thai. 100% recommended.

3.review_text: A lovely hotel that graciously upgraded our room free of charge. Great facilities and a good buffet breakest. It's in a good location close to restaurants, 7-Eleven and the BTS. Nui the room attendent was very helpful and friendly.

4.review_text: I was fortunate enough to be stuck in Thailand during the COVID lockdown. The staff here is amazing, they have taken great care of me.  The housekeeping staff, especially Panisa (Nui), has gone above and beyond to make my stay comfortable, clean, safe and enjoyable.  The area is relatively clean and quiet. Room service food is delicious and reasonably priced.

5.review_text: I stayed here for about a month and a half, because it was one of the few hotels in Bangkok that met all of my requirements, which were: kitchen in the room and a swimming pool/gym at a decent price. The price, in fact, was greatly reduced due to   the COVID crisis, and I got a free upgrade the day I arrived! It's a kind of business-style hotel, and the rooms are fairly spacious. The place is in the heart of Sathorn, down a small alley and surrounded by the chaos of the city, not far away from the BTS. The staff was helpful and welcoming, and addressed any problems I had. I think for the price it's hard to beat at the moment. The only negative thing I can think of is the free newspaper in the lobby -- it's (Chinese) propaganda!

6.review_text: Really love this hotel since the first day with nice and friendly staff, foods are delicious. Fitness and swimming pool are quite and provided alcohol gel during covid-19. All precesses which is concerned with virus are safe and hygiene. I like view from the room. Worst it.

7.review_text: We were amazed by how nice the room was as we didn’t expect much from it due to the low price. The hotel was nice and clean and we got a nice city view on the 10th floor. Our room has a bathtub, a big refrigerator, and a cooking space but unfortunately there wasn’t any pots and pans we can cook. But we were happy enough with what we were given. At first we weren’t happy with the A/C because of its loud noise but the engineer came and it was kind of a bit better. Front desk Mr. Mint was kind and provided us everything we need. You might want to look for him when you come to stay. They also have a pool and gym. Seriously, can any hotel be anymore valuable!? Also, breakfast was nice and worth the price!

8.review_text: Tucked away behind the Bangkok Bank HQ and just a short walk from Chong Nonsi BTS, this property offers an ideal base for city exploring or business commitments in the CBD. The front desk team members are charming, well-trained and have excellent English language skills. Duty Manager Khun Prim is a real gem. Very helpful indeed. The restaurant menu includes a variety of popular Thai dishes at sensible prices. Limited parking but the hotel is easily accessible by taxi and on foot from the BTS station. Excellent value and highly recommended.

9.review_text: Enjoyed a 2 week stay. All hotel services were exceptional. Staff most accommodating. Room very quiet and comfortable. A prime location located between Silom and Sathorn Roads. Will be back again next year.

10.review_text: Actually is 2 months that I live at furama exclusive sathorn and I really advise it.location very good near Bts and near lumpini Park.Very different kinds of rooms.staff very kind.price very convenient.i spend lot of the time at swimming pool, but this is my personal choice. At the end Furama International Hotel it's a garanty !!!

11.review_text: The rooms are very old and noisy. We booked the premier room for 800thb (prices are low because if covid) we also paid 700thb extra for breakfast. I think from all the hotels in my life this was the worst breakfast ever. The staff is nice and the serivce is oke. But for this breakfast i will go to 7eleven next time. And will all the noise in the hallway maybe its also better to sleep at the 7eleven;)

12.review_text: We are staying at Furama X Sathorn for a few weeks now. Prim, Mey, Tak and all the staff are great and friendly. Location is good, near everything and Lumpini Park for walks Tom and her coworkers keep the rooms very clean.

13.review_text: Good location (near BTS and MRT), clean and comfortable rooms with small kitchen, professional staff.  The staff was very nice and polite. The restuarant was also good. Everything was excellent. Good place for both short and long stay.

14.review_text: The staff here are professional, polite and always there to help. Especially the female manager, who by the way has a great haircut and Mint who dealt with anything I needed.  The rooms vary so make sure you ask for what you would like, I prefer a large bed, walk in shower and a view.  So they gave me the 12th floor perfect... Slept well, comfy rooms with small kitchen area.  Pool area and gym a great bonus.  The breakfast was free and plenty to choose from, only thing need improvement is the coffee which is a machine so not great. Everything else, cleaning service, room cleaning staff excellent and friendly. Very near Chong nonsi so good for exploring.  When visiting Bangkok I would definitely return.

15.review_text: Housekeeping and reception staff were fantastic during our three day stay including the trainee receptionist who was excellent. WiFi was good. On the negative side - Room 212 is to be avoided at all costs unless you like a very dark and depressing room. We were moved to 10th floor (again handled excellently by staff). However new room whilst much better re windows had a much smaller bed and a shower in a bath which flooded the bathroom every time. The shower broke but again was fixed extremely promptly. No walk-in shower like similar rooms. Air con was very effective. Worst experience was food at the hotel. A group of 24 of us ate the first night. Food was cold. Breakfast in three mornings was also cold and very little choice. Our worst experience of hotel food ever. No winder…

16.review_text: City hotel We had a fair size room which had a small kitchen Two ring hob,kitchen sink and loads of kitchen cupboards!!! Bathroom fine Good hot water Air con worked well Very large bed We were told not all rooms are so good No bar area and if you do get a drink they are expensive £10 for a glass of red wine😡 We had an organised dinner for a group which turned out to be a disappointment 👎

17.review_text: I booked a good deal for this hotel with Agoda (recommended for booking hotels in SE Asia).  Great location next to Chong Nonsi BTS stop and easy walking to Silom/Sala Daeng.  The hotel staff were friendly although they did initially send us to the wrong room - they corrected their mistake quickly, as we had only just taken off our shoes.  Once settled in the correct room, it was spacious and clean.  In the morning there was a free breakfast buffet - the coffee was not good but I was happy to get a plate of free fresh fruit.  Overall I had a pleasant stay and if I need to be in this area again, I wouldn't hesitate to choose this hotel.

18.review_text: The hotel is located centrally near Patpong, it is getting old and in need of renovation. The rooms are quite large and the bath too, but the bath with a shower is a bit suicidal when you start to get old and stiff so only the shower had been better. the pool area was not that impressive either, the pool was ok but there was no bar where you could order food or drink. The breakfast is like in many other places where it is a bit cheaper, there are not so many Western products and more Asian dishes. If you are traveling through one or two days and do not set such high demands on the pool area then it is ok, on a romantic holiday you will probably need a little more.

19.review_text: I was with a group and the staff made us feel very welcome, the rooms were comfortable and clean , the kettles were a bit crazy you got 2 bottles of water a day but it took pretty much all that to cover the minimum level. It is a good hotel but possibly not the best location in Bangkok but there were some markets nearby to explore and maybe 20 mins away visit Lumpini Park and try the coffee shop nearby.

20.review_text: Great location close to Chongnonsi and Saladaeng BTS and to Silom MRT. The neighbourhood is one of the coziest in Bangkok. Close to Lumphini Park and Silom Rd. The view from the rooms are breathtaking. I really liked the pool area, which was sunny talmost half of the day even if the area is mostly high risers.  P'Lookpla and P'Tom were amazing hosts!

21.review_text: The hotel is in a very busy and well connected area but being on a side road it's  quite. The room was clean, although not new, and very big with a bed room and living room. The fabric of the sofa and the bathroom were a bit worn out. Breakfast and pool were just ok. From the pictures the hotel looks fancier than it actually is. Also, some of the pictures posted on tripadvisor are wrong, the actual dining room is the one with the orange and blue chairs, not the fancy one with wood chairs and sofas. It's a very standard Hotel, but being clean and quiet it's good value for money. We booked a room for three people but, when there, we were told we had to pay extra for the third person's bed and breakfast. Maybe it was our mistake when booking? I don't know, anyway be careful about…

22.review_text: First time I stay in this hotel staff very friendly especially Ms.Nokweed, Mr.Karn very good service breakfast is very nice and room so good. Hotel have swimming pool near by sky train reception very helpful Mr.Adam, Mr.Tum I hope come back to this hotel again for next time.

23.review_text: Room is clean and nice staff here so friendly and service is good like stay home .. location is easy to go every where cos near bts . Near by hotel also have resturant easy to get food and local market in the day time

24.review_text: We were greeted with a friendly smile and kind gestures. We rarely receive such friendly attitude at desk counters but here you get the whole nine yards. Thank you to thing thing , Porsche, Tak lookpla for their friendly and amazing service at this hotel. Keep up the amazing work

25.review_text: Nice hotel in a very central location yet nice and quiet.  Reception were very helpful on arrival and made the checkin easy, especially one of the staff named Lookpla.  On site parking nice and convenient.  Would be happy to stay here again.

26.review_text: We love the Furama hotel in Sathorn, they really make you feel like you're coming home. The staff at breakfast always remember us and want to have a quick chat on our arrival.  Location is another plus but the main reason we continue to come is the people who look after us during our stay.

27.review_text: Cet hôtel est très correcte.very clean.very welcome.hearty breakfast and excellent service.Thanks at San, Can, Karn, nok weed.I recommend this hotel with confidence.see you soon. Thanks very welcom all

28.review_text: The location of this hotel is extremely convenient with BTS Chong Nonsi Station less than 5 mins walk. Plenty of taxis and tuk-tuk readily available outside hotel entrance. Wide array of restaurants, cafes and street food around the hotel. Staff service were impressive. Room is a little dated but comfortable and spacious. Breakfast spread was good for this price. Highly recommended!

29.review_text: I stayed here for 3 nights from feb8-feb11, first of all an agency chose the hotel and we were immediately unimpressed after checking in. The hotel was located in a weird alleyway, hard to find and away from all the liveliness of the town and city, we had to drive everywhere! Secondly, the rooms were old and dirty, our shower wasn’t clean when we checked in, one of the two elevators didn’t work.  HERE’S THE WORST OF IT ALL!!! After I checked out, I headed for breakfast thinking all is good, then on my way out the door someone yells after me(mind you it’s 7am and the lobby was filled with ppl waiting for their transportations and some checking out). I walk over to the desk and the guy behind the desk with gloves on is picking out my towels from my room from plastic bag and going…

30.review_text: Coming to Bangkok,many times always stay here.very clean;staff very friendly; good lacation next to the BTS.line. The food very good love the breakfast  And lunch. I do higley recommended. The staff here know how to look after the turismo. And they also have a knowledge of Bangkok,wich is very handy. And speak inglesh very well.

31.review_text: Location wise, it's near BTS station and easily accessible to Silom area as well.  Front Office Clark Ms. Namaoy and Ms. Khanom are friendly and had smooth check out.  The room I stayed at needs a bit of touch up.  Other than that, I'm satisfied.

32.review_text: We stayed at this hotel for two nights and we can recommend it. The room was clear. The staff was very helpful and nice. My boyfriend lost his phone in the taxi und the staff (Adam and Thing Thing Tum) helped us immediately, they called the taxi driver and my boyfriend got his phone back. We are very thankful for that!  The breakfast was very delicious with a big choice of food.   Only the lady at the taxi service in the hotel did not meet up our expectations. We just wanted to get a taxi from the hotel to Grand Palace. She wanted to sell us a sightseeing package and said that we couldn‘t see the temples without this package. At the end we had to get a taxi on our own. We didn‘t have any problems seeing the temples. And we even needed less money than the package had cost.   All…

33.review_text: The staff are welcoming. Full equipment in the room There is a swimming pool, fitness, washing machine ready to live like a condo. Breakfast has a medium selection. Dinner is ok They work hard, rose pure kan Thank you everyone so much

34.review_text: Have no words. It's one of the most comfortable stay we ever experienced. The front desk staff is so welcoming it almost feels at home. Tak rose thing thing and everyone there is so helpful and accommodating. They just take care of everything for you. A small cozy dining place in the lobby is state of the art and all the amenities provided are absolutely enough and perfect.  I will definitely would love to stay there on my next trip. They out of the way took care of my lil one. At odd hours they provided food for my baby. Thank you so much for making my stay so comfortable.

35.review_text: Very friendly staff, Nice to children, helpfull, Nice rooms, breakfast is good everyday fresh noodles, and welcomed by the lovely smiles from Nokweed, Karn, San. Visiting Bangkok again we would definitly book this hotel again

36.review_text: No complaints. Excellent little hotel. Self service laundry is very useful & well looked after. Housekeeping staff are all pleasant & professional. Nokweed, New, Tea & Adam are great staff & always helpful. Would definitely stay again.

37.review_text: I stay here with the group and I would like to thank some nice staff Nui from housekeeping has taken good care of me. Lookpla and Mint from the front office has given me great smiles throughout the day . I feel very happy to receive such nice welcoming. I will surely come to stay here again.

38.review_text: Stayed here for 2 nights at the end of SE Asia tour.  I'm usually a little unsure of hst to expect of hotels in large cities.  I'd consider this a hidden gem.   Location was excellent short walk from metro station.  Staff were very helpful  the room spacious and clean, very small gym area and a nice swimming pool.  Breakfast had limited choice but was more than ample.    Overall a great stay.

39.review_text: It was the first time we stayed in this hotel. We were first welcomed by the staff in the check in counter. They found that we had been a VIP member so we were upgraded to a higher level. The staff Namaoy, Khanom and Tak were very polite and helpful.

40.review_text: Review as non-staying customer. Thai food and steak are cheap and tasty, come with free salad bar and ice cream. Waiter clearly explain available menu and promotion. Food served in few minutes. Waiter list / รายชื่อพนักงาน สันต์ โรส เพียว ก้าน

41.review_text: This hotel is not exactly new, but the room condition is still nice. The room they gave me this time is with city view and not facing Hotel at the back. Thank you so much for the friendly male reception staff for this free room upgrade.  Many eating places and convenience shops around the hotel. BTS is 5-10mins walking and Silom Complex also is about 10mins walking. Breakfast is simple with asian and western food. Overall, it is s good stay.

42.review_text: When you want someone is polite and friendly, here you can have first class service in real time. Even one night staying, I already know stuff by names when they follow my wishes. In security, they very helpful also when I needed to ask some services.   Not so many places with this value have so good service and feel enough luxury. Thank very much for example Rose, Nok Weed, Namaoy, Adam and many others who make my visit and feelings good about Thai people.   I felt very welcome here. Sure next time my choice when visiting embassy.  Even city area, you can find original Thai life in small roads , local restaurants and many other services. Even you travel in business, you feel like holiday with swimming pool, outside coffee place, big restaurant and so on. And also, there is 7/11…

43.review_text: Friendly and service minded staff(Namaoy, Khanom and Porsche . Nice rooms, good breakfast. Great location. Big busy area. On walking distance to Silom Rd. I come here often, they always are kindful and helpful.

44.review_text: Everything is great except WiFi could be little slow or giving issue at night. Breakfast is great. I recommend people to choose breakfast when they book the hotel. Phim, and Mint are very welcoming and respectful, as well as other associates. Everybody is very welcome. Area is very safe and not too far from central.

45.review_text: Nice hotel the reception girl Namaoy is really nice! Food and drinks arranged by Rose and Nam was really good allot of around the world choises. The people that work here are super polite. The pool was very clean and a good temprature

46.review_text: Very good location if you have to go to the embassy also near the shopping airia.   Very friendly staff especially the girls at the reception, thingthing and Namaoy Lookpla. Super good breakfast aswel.  The room where I stay could use an upgrade, some details in the bathroom where missed aswel.

47.review_text: Location was great & the staff (Thing2, Namaoy/Maew) were really good. They upgraded my stay to better which is more spacious .  Maybe the hotel is old, hot/cold shower is inconsistent. But still OK for me 😁

48.review_text: The receptionist are friendly especially thing thing prom and mint. They’re helpful and guide us to where we want to go tell us the way and they speak in a polite way. Patient in the way of answering us question.

49.review_text: Excellent Hospitality especially from the kitchen Crew ..San, Pure and Rose ..  great meal ..Good gym and amenities   Rooms were done up well, thoroughly enjoyed my stay   I will recommend this hotel to my other colleagues   keep up the good work

50.review_text: I have been stay in this hotel several times, the location is great with 5 mins walk to skytrain station, 10 minutes to night market. The room is spacious and clean. All staff is nice and helpful especially the tall manageress, Namaoy and Mint.

51.review_text: I stayed in this hotel just for a night but I was really appreciated! First receptionist name ‘mint’ helped a lot with kindness. The hotel is in a good location, near BTS and many restaurants around. Gym and pool are clean. Many choices for breakfast with a delicious taste.

52.review_text: For last year i stayed here for business to long time and this year i’m also come here again the staff very very lovely and friendly.  Khanom Mayom Tak and another staff’s thank you very much for help us everything.  ICE

53.review_text: Good hotel with very nice staff. The room was spacious and clean. Bathroom has pretty big showers, sink and toilet. Was very clean as well. There is also a kitchen within the room. I liked the location- only a few minutes walking from the Skytrain station. There are a lot of restaurants in this area and night markets as well. Breakfast was nice. The pool is small, but still enough for a relax in the bustling city of Bangkok.

54.review_text: I stayed here for 3 mths & felt like at home. All the staff are very friendly & helpful. The front desk staff help me with a lot of requests such as to book grab for me, etc... front desk staff: Adam, Mint, Thing Thing, Mayom, Khanom, Nam Aoy and Lookpla. Very very dedicated staff.   And not forgetting the manager Ms Prim, MsTak & night shift staff.  Bellboys - Porsche and Tam and one more (sorry, forgot your name). Very good service.  Restaurant supervisor - Mr San and Nokweed and Rose. Hard working and good service as well.  Housekeeping - Mdm Tu. She does her work meticulously   And the rest of the staff that i have spoken to or met but forgot their names.  Will stay here next time when im back for business trip.   From Latiff

55.review_text: Stayed last December, and now in January. I was surprised with the extra kindness of the hotel staff! They made sure the guests are doing ok. Our room was upgraded with a living room and an extra bedroom. Very spacious. I wanted a kitchen so I can cook simple dishes but only the smaller rooms have a kitchen. I think they should make a bigger gym. It was so small. We had to book at the nearest gym for a month although we stayed in Bangkok for only 10 days. And because we go to the gym, we really need a washer and dryer in the room. They have a laundry space but with only 2 washers and 1 dryer so we had to wait for the others to finish in order to use it. They should provide baskets to put finished laundry just in case the owner doesn't pick their laundry on time so others can use…

56.review_text: Furama Xclusive Sathorn could have been a perfect choice if only it's located in the city center. The hotel itself is nice. Although not new & modern, it's clean & well-maintained. The lobby also smells nice & they offer complimentary pandan juice.   The room is spacious. For the price that we paid for, we were not expecting a huge 1-bedroom suite with a living room & another large TV apart from the one in the bedroom. There's also 2 airconditioning units, 1 in the bedroom & 1 in the living room. Plenty of storage space, too. The other room that we got, on the other hand, is a studio type with a kitchen & large refrigerator. Complimentary bottled water is replenished everyday.  We were also satisfied with their service. Everyone was very nice, accommodating, & helpful.  …

57.review_text: This is a relatively small and friendly hotel well located and with very pleasant helpful staff.  Particular mention of Mint and Thing Thing who made me feel welcome when I checked in.  Also Nok Weed, Pure, Karn and Kan at breakfast.

58.review_text: The Hotel is very nice and it’s located in walking distance to Skytrain. There are so many restaurants around the hotel and 7-11 which make you comfortable. The hotel staffs are also very nice. They are willing to provide for good services especially Mint and Namaoy. I’m so happy with this hotel and next time I will come back again.

59.review_text: Thanks the service of Nuli and Lookpla!!! They are very kind and nice for the room clean service, on time and professional. It is my pleasure to have the stay in this hotel. Also like to visit BKK again

60.review_text: The Furama XClusive is like a hidden jem of nice hotel in Bangkok.Location is not far from Skytrain which operate till midnight.Surrounding the hotel have seafood local restaurant,24 hours convience store which make you comfortable.Swimming pool and fitness also make you enjoyable.And very nice & friendly team are amazing..  Big thanks Prim,Namaoy,Rose,Pure and Nokweed..keep continue your professional service and we'll come back to stay with your hotel again.  Strong recommendation for this hotel for someone who looking for the hotel around skytrain.

61.review_text: I just want to thanks to Ms Nok Weed for the amazing room service during my stay. Such as friendly and helpful I couldn’t ask anything more. And thanks again for making my NYE party fun in Bangkok so now I can look forward to 2020!

62.review_text: Very nice Hotel with friendly stuff ( Namaay and Adam ). Got a free upgrade to room 303 🎉🎉🎉. If they give a free breakfast will be great 😬. Very clean , nice swimming pool, and very strategic location, close to silom and tourist area. Surely will comeback and stay here.

63.review_text: Helpful front desk staff changed our rooms after the first one was too noisy. Great pool walking distance to BTS. Comfortable rooms with New beds and linen and great pillows. Great housekeeping especially Nui. Plenty of bottled water in rooms.

64.review_text: Great position in Si Lom. Rooms are big, comfortable and clean . The breakfast is very good with a lot of choice. Staff is super kind, special thanks to Adam and Namaoy. We strongly recommend this hotel.

65.review_text: Is good hotel near sky train very good staff ms.namaoi Mr.Adam and Mr. Beer very assistances breakfast very nice near Silom road room it ok clean and comfortable we will come back again to this hotel.

66.review_text: I stayed  here around 3 months for business. The hotel was good , breakfast was really great and expectedly the staffs here have a great attitude and service mind. I would  like to thank you Khun Namaoy, Khun Adam, Khun Nokweed, Kan, Khun Rose, Khun Kan, Khun Nam, Khun Sun, Khun Karn, Khun Pieow a lot for your great services.

67.review_text: I know hotels around this area well and I select where to stay depending highly on the prices offered. This time Furama was a good deal. I know what to expect from this hotel and it did not disappoint me.

68.review_text: price is reasonable, location is good, the room is clean.  show curtain can't block the water well, water leak to the floor easily after showering.  Room service staffs Ms. Noi and Ms. Pom are good at attitude.

69.review_text: This hotel is just of 3 mins walk to BTS. The staff is very friendly and helpful. The room is spacious and clean. It is an ideal choice for travellers who like night life and local food too. The only issue is about the air conditioner which is a bit noisy. This is common for many central air conditioning anyway. But it can be turned off if you do concern about the noise.

70.review_text: The hotel was nice.The staff  are very helpfy.And also the food was exerence.the location is nice in the centrr of the city very easy to go every where.The staff name Khun Nam Khun Pure Khun Rose and Khun Nok weed they are so nice and look after the clint very well and I appreciate so much.

71.review_text: We had a great visit to Bangkok and stayed a the FuramaXclusive hotel. We had a fantastic room and the staff was great. Very kind and great service. Especially Miss Rose and Nok Weed. Thank you for the great experience.

72.review_text: During our holiday we stayd in this hotel. We had a big room with an extra big room. The breakfast was very good and the people are very friendly. If you are looking for a good hotel in Bangkok this is a good choice

73.review_text: Rose is very swift and the serviced very well. She is an asset to the Hotel and based on her hard work I am sure she will achieve many more milestones in her career. New year 2020 will bring her lot of prosperity n which her all succeaa

74.review_text: Got upgraded to executive suite - very huge and clean.  The hotel is located near the BTS station, and the staff are very helpful and welcoming!   Special thanks to Tak, Prim, Thing Thing, Namaoy, Khanom and Mayom for the birthday surprise!

75.review_text: We've stayed at Furama few times since 2006. It was quite experience and trendy hotel then with lot's of Western tourists. Then we we witness how it became overpriced place with a bit tired amenities.  Nowadays it is affordable very nice located old (sorry guys) hotel with very warm and friendly atmosphere. The shift with Mayom and Khanom Lookpla was so helpful checked un us tired from a long flight as soon as they could. Many thanks and Christmas greetings for lovely young Ladies. Keep going like that and your place will be very popular for a long time more. PS. Breakfast is very good as well

76.review_text: Great location only 200m to the nearest BTS and on the same line to the Silom and MBK shopping areas. Excellent value from the generous room sizes to the quality breakfasts. Very friendly and helpful staff.

77.review_text: I have during countless trips to Bangkok stayed in several hotels.  Furama Xclusive Sathorn has turned out to be my preferred choice.   Besides tbe value for money,  having both a swimming pool and a smaller f gym,  the location is extremely convenient and peaceful despite being in a very eventful area of Bangkok.   The staff has always been extremely flexible, friendly and helpful whatever I have needed and making me feel home and relaxed.   In general all have been nice to me amongst the very kind housekeeping staff. From the front desk I have always been greeted by Mint, Namoya, Phol and Tak whom always greets me kindly "welcome home"  If above sounds appealing to you then this hotel is a great choice.   Brds  Thomas Stadler Nielsen

78.review_text: The staff was very welcoming and nice. They offered us lemon grass juice and a plate of fruits just as we arrived. The room was spacious and clean and had an amazing view! The area is close to almost everything you'd need.

79.review_text: We had a amazing holiday in this hotel, everything was super fine! We had an amazing employee in the restaurant her name is Nok Weed , she is such a good person thank you for making our holiday so good!

80.review_text: I always stay in this affordable hotel whenever I am in this area. Although the area is home to many new and chic hotels, Furama Xclusive Sathorn provides value for money. The hotel is well maintained and it is near the BTS and eateries.  This time, I am impressed by the staff's amazing service. I requested not to stay in a certain room because part of the king size bed is under the false ceiling. Khun Thing and Khun Tee not only acceded to my request, they unexpectedly upgraded me to a premiere suite.

81.review_text: I used this hotel for about 2 months for a long stay.  The hotel is a bit old, but no problem.  The temperature of the bath water is slightly lower. ( Is this Thailand culture??)  The staff were all kind and helpful, especially Ms.Thing Thing,Ms.Tak,Ms.Namaoy!!  If I have the opportunity, I want to use this hotel again.

82.review_text: The room is nice and big. Very near to BTS station. Friendly staff like Ms. Namaoy and Mr. Mint. Breakfast fast also nice. Many street foods and restaurants around the hotel. You can enjoy your stay with FurumaXclusive Sathorn. WiFi also fast.

83.review_text: I would like to thank khun khanom, adam, tum, eiang and joom for the wonderful service! Special thanks to the front desk for helping us claim back our lost item, we are very grateful for their excellent service and continuous smiles.  The hotel is also located in a wonderful area around many street food stalls, aesthetic cafes and a BTS station less than 5 mins walk away. I will definitely highly recommend:)

84.review_text: I really love this hotel & stayed at here for more than 8 times. Reasons, they have good breakfast, room maintained very clean and spacious. friendly, helpful & polite staffs who help me during my late check in (Their name are May, Thing, Aoy & Porsche). Would also thank you to house keeper auntie tidy my room every day. I will come back again Furama Xclusive Sathorn 😬❤💛💚💙💜. One more thing, restaurant crews always smile and great you every morning and make my lovely day.

85.review_text: I just lived there for one night but their kind service impressed me a lot. Especially thanks Mayom, Khan, Adam, Tim. They are just too nice and sweet. When I checked out they double checked if I left anything and found I left my medicine in the closet. Really appreciate them for being so kind. Definitely will revisit it next time.

86.review_text: A nice hotel with a good location close to the Skytrain. The service is excellent, and the personell are very polite. Mayom and Lookpla treated us very well, and upgraded our regular room to a suite upon check in, a very nice gesture. Breakfast is very good. Only downside with the hotel is that some of the rooms could need a light renovation.

87.review_text: A nice and cosy hotel.Very close to the bts.Also very quiet even though it's quite near the street. I would reccomend you some great staff such as Miss Mayom,Mr. Mint,Miss Namaoy, and Miss Lookpla. They are very nice,they always smile and give me good service.Thank you

88.review_text: I would like to say thank you to Kun Namaoy mint She provide a very good service to the hotel guess I have a package Will deliver to this hotel Kun Namaoy mint Help me make a phone call to confirm my package will arrive at this hotel in time before I check out. Thank you very much Kun Namaoy mint

89.review_text: Nice hotel, good and clean rooms. Close to the metro line. Nice and helpful staff? 7-eleven close by.  Good place to start exploring metro: quick in town, and other direction in few minutes by ferries.  Next time I will book this hotel again.

90.review_text: I’ve just checked in at Furama Xclusive Sathorn & the experience has been lovely & smooth from beginning to end. Lookpla, Namaoy, Mint & Prim greeted me with wide smiles & seamlessly checked me in while continuing to chat with me & make me comfortable. They also kindly upgraded my room due to unavailability of the room type booked for me. I will definitely be coming back to Furama Xclusive Sathorn during my next Bangkok visit. Keep up your good work Lookpla, Namaoy, Mint & Prim😀

91.review_text: The hotel staff is very friendly.  The house keeping Nui is very helpful she always assist me when I need room cleaning.Nokweed was very nice to me when I went to have breakfast.And last but not least the front office Lookpla is very cute,she always smile.  Furama has many lovely staff and service. I am very happy ,thank you

92.review_text: stayed at the hotel with my family for 10 nights. The staff was very helpful and friendly. Our special appreciation to Mayom, Thing Thing at the reception desk, Nok Weed and San for the excellent breakfast service and Mr Joe for the transport arrangement. The room was spacious but was a bit outdated. Location was accessible to BTS station. We enjoyed our stay

93.review_text: Stayed here with my family on 12th of october. The check in was quick and the staff was very cordial and nice. The parking space is on the ground floor and very convenient. The breakfast can be better with more vegetarian options. We were even  upgraded to a better room.  Highly recommended.

94.review_text: Breakfast was delicious.Miss.Rose, Mr.Kan Miss.Pim, Mr.Mint and Miss.Thingthing are Good hosts Room was spacious.essential Amenities were in good condition.  Receptionist at check in are beautiful people. I always got room of my choice at this hotel.  Plan to stay again at this hotel.  Wonderful.

95.review_text: Breakfast was delicious.'Ms Nok Weed'is a Good host.  Room was spacious.essential Amenities were in good condition.  Receptionist at check in are beautiful people. I always got room of my choice at this hotel.  Plan to stay again at this hotel.  Wonderful.

96.review_text: Whenever I come to Bangkok on business trip, I book room in this hotel. Very friendly and helpful staff and the rooms are also great. Only change I would request to have dessert in free breakfast menu. Rest all is great One of the staff (Pure) remembers that I had brought my son once and always enquires about him...☺️

97.review_text: Review for Thing thing and Namaoy I like the co-operative and helpful nature of the staff. Well maintained hotel and I don't get any difficulty in booking taxi and safari world tickets. Very nice decorations and all

98.review_text: Lookpla, Namaoy and ThingThing(receptionist) very helpful,  hotel clean, very good services. Location of hotel quite ok, near skytrain good to commuting to city, comfy bed value for money. Breakfast is ok

99.review_text: nice and friendly reception. Good location at the center of Bangkok business ar nearby BTS skytrain and it make the journey more easy to see old BKK from the river. On foot to MRT for Chinatown,Wat pho and grand palace.

100.review_text: Staff was friendly they name Mint and Thing Thing very helpful to advise information and the room is comfortable, cleanliness. The location is convenient close to the business district and sky train station.

Alt Hotel Nana by UHG, Bangkok.address: 222 Sukhumvit Soi 4 Sub Soi 2 (Nana) Khlong Toei, Khlong Toei, Bangkok 10110 Thailand

1.review_text: I come here often and the staff name pang and Joe from the reception always greet me with smile  that's why I come here ragulary free tuk tuk to main road there is gym and pool definitely will be back soon

2.review_text: I have been travelling to Bangkok over the last years and tried many hotels and alt hotel nana by UHG is the best one that I have stayed at so far. The rooms, service, wonderful staff that are always very helpful, especially Nina and Tuntun at the breakfast are amazing with their service and make you feel like home. Alt Nana hotel is my first choice and would highly recommend this place to anyone who visit Bangkok.

3.review_text: I had a great time at this hotel the staff are very nice and very helpful as well. I will be back to stay again I would definitely recommend this place for people traveling The weather is nice the hotel is clean and the people are very helpful

4.review_text: The best hotel I have stayed in Bangkok, in terms of the price it cost me. Mr. Tun Tun helping us serving the breakfast was very humble and kind man. He was also very communicative and active. That's what guest look for anyway. Good customer service more than just good facilities. The rooms are very clean and worth ever penny. Definitely recommended.

5.review_text: This hotel has been home away from home. Even better than home I don't have room service back home lol. The staff treat you like family I've been staying here since the pandemic and it's been very clean and chill. The rooms are nice housekeeping is the best I've had on this trip. The bathroom shower is rainfall it's been great. Good place to quarantine. Reception is 24/7 Nam has been a lot of help. Thank you Nam and thanks to the shuttle drivers always there when I need them.

6.review_text: I stumbled over the hotel by its amazing rating on Agoda. After arriving here in mid December and just having extended my stay into February I cannot rave enough about this hotel. This in itself should serve as a great recommendation. The service is amazing. Joe (the front desk manager), Nina and Joke do everything to make your stay very pleasant and are also a great resource for planing activities. The amount of attentiveness, creativity and friendliness are breathtaking. Needless to say, the rooms are spacious and very clean, the bed extremely comfortable, the food (in particular the breakfast buffet - thanks Nina for the great talks and service) fantastic. It is like feeling at home. The location of the hotel is also a clear plus. It is in a side street of Soi 4, which gives…

7.review_text: I been here since beginning of January with my Boyfriend room price is good and  clean,  we like the atmosphere here, all staff are kind and helpful specially thanks to Khun PANG from reception, she help us for everything we needs ♥️ Definitely will be back again

8.review_text: Had a great time at ALT hotel , they are not expensive, the staff was extremely professional, specially the manager named NAM , will surely visit again, you can get one room around 400 thai baht  ALT Hotel by UHG

9.review_text: A very lovely hotel with a reasonable price.My boyfriend and I stay there for 5 day from countdown till 4th in new year and we have a great day there except that we got a room no. 402 which they have a very loud air condition , when we would like to go out to BTS they have a free tuktuk that will drive you there from 6 am till 10 pm and they are so lovely. My boyfriend really enjoy breakfast at the hotel  ,every morning we went there and staff name Nina who is really friendly , helpful and always smile and also food is great .  Will comeback soon if I have a chance.

10.review_text: It happens to my long stay here in this hotel, the overall experience is very good.  However the restaurant part,  since the staff here Ms Nina she was lovely and friendly to all the guest.  I enjoyed the breakfast and  the hospitality here.  Would highly recommend for those visited BKK to choose this hotel.

11.review_text: A nice hotel with small price as a good choice in Nana zone, facilities and room sizes better than expected. Warm welcome with staff named Joe at reception provided information and guidance very nice. Love most for early check in available at 10.00am onwards, pretty cool!

12.review_text: The absolute greatest long-term stay. Staff is helpful, responsive and always available. Tuk-tuk is reliable for neighborhood transportation. Convenient parking is available but is sometimes limited depending on hotel volume.

13.review_text: The hotel is located in the middle of the city. Skytrain is only 5 mins walk away. My room was so comfortable and clean. I stayed there overnight during visiting family and friends Staffs were so helpful and kind. Thank you Pang, Nam & Toon for their assisting. They all made my life easier. Definitely coming back, high recommended in this area. I felt privileged everytime when I was there.Thanks guys.

14.review_text: This is one of my favorite budget hotel. The room was very wide and clean. I booked an Economy Room type but was upgraded to superior room. I got a very cheap price for two nights comparing to the quality it was very worth. Staff named Pang was very nice and helpful

15.review_text: Good service but we have to walk so long from BTS.  Reasonable price. :) But please be informed that there is a shuttle Tuk Tuk service from hotel. Hotel also provides free internet and spectacular outdoor pool for customer to relax :)

16.review_text: A nice hotel at affordable price. Now they are offering an early check-in and a late check-out. It's clean and convenient locating in the middle of the city. Only 5 minutes driving from Nana BTS Station and they also offer free transportation service between the place and the BTS station. The service is impressive. Such a good choice of accommodation in Bangkok!

17.review_text: What a nice stay at Alt Nana Hotel. Nam at a reception was so nice and kind. Help us with showing different rooms and was very proffesional. Nam is the best😊. Nice breakfast in the morning with many varieties and have smak tuk tuk to take you to Nana Plaza area. Nice small swimming pool and gym. New Building is nice to stay. Visitor friendly. Would stay again for sure as the price was right.

18.review_text: Staff are very friendly and breakfast is excellent, room was spacious with a comfortable bed, I will come back here as location was good as well. I would recommend this hotel to anyone who is looking for a good affordable room.

19.review_text: Big rooms nice breakfast friendly stuff specially Tuntun he is so kind and the beautiful receiption lady Nam so helpful.. Thank you all every thing was great and i already submited some photo for my suite And yes try the massage with Rose she is amazing in the same hotel..

20.review_text: Loved our stay! Staff are helpful, sincere and friendly.  Great room with kitchen and lounge. Daily cleaning and re stocking of supplies. Excellent pool and gym facility, clean and comfortable.  Good Cuppachinos too

21.review_text: I was stay there for couple day with my friend and breakfast is good they make fresh egg. And room very clean and comfortable. Also have shuttle service to Main Street very close to bts station. And nam the one in reception she very nice with her smile. But pool and gym very small but that’s fine. “ I’ll come back again for sure”

22.review_text: The hotel is located in the center of nightlife in Sukhumvit. But still has a very calm surrounding. Need to walk a bit though from the Sukhumvit road. They even run a free shuttle service from the main road to the hotel premises.  There are many restaurants, bars and stores at a walking distance. There is even a food bazaar at the back side of the restaurant.    The staff were friendly. Requested for a birthday decoration before check-in and it was done and ready by the time we checked in. Awesome decoration in fact.   The room was great. Spacious as well. It had a nice couch and a recliner sofa. The bed was comfortable. The balcony was facing the highways, not a bad view either. The bathtub was the only thing missing.   A nice stay for a nominal price. I would recommend this…

23.review_text: No doubt one of my best stays for my both short and long term stays. Very clean comfortable hotel, really feels like Home with excellent breakfast and staff, especially Nam. She been very helpful and always positive to provide great service, a good example of how staff should be.  Would definitely stay there again without hesitation.

24.review_text: I attended the hotel Alt Hotel Nana in Bangkok on October 11, 2020. I previously booked and paid the hotel through Agoda for a Junior Suite. I was initially attended at the reception by a woman receptionist called Ms. Chompoonuch (Nam). Afterwards, when I entered into the room I realized that the room didn't have bathtub according with the facilities mentioned at Agoda for the type of room that I paid for Junior Suite. Therefore, I called the reception to request them to change into another room and Ms. Chompoonuch (Nam) told me in an abrupt manner that the room doesn't have bathtub because I didn't specify on the options that I would like to have bathtub and if I wanted that additional accessory I should specify that in advance at the time that I made the booking. Then she told…

25.review_text: The Hotel has a great location and it has an free tuk tuk to take you to the main road near the sky train station. The staff is very friendly, special mention to NAM and FAH that speak perfect English and with a big smile helped at all time as well as gave good suggestions. The hotel is really clean. the room is big and has everything I needed. It was pretty quiet so I could rest well. The breakfast is a good small buffet, all that you need to start the day with coffe, juice, toast, salad, omelete, rice, pasta, meat,etc. It was a good stay and very affordable, probably because of the Covid19 situation. Thank you NAM and FAH, I will sure be back again.

26.review_text: Really nice big junior suite rooms  Hotel as its own TUK TUK to take you to to the end of the street or BTS satiation. Also pick up from BTS for free   7/11 store near by.  Pool was great.  Thanks Nam at reception.

27.review_text: Awesome staff, Good breakfast, spacious rooms. Pang is super friendly and helpful at the reception.  Location is a bit out of the center however the hey have a shuttle and take you anytime during the day. Very happy stay  Definitely return

28.review_text: We were traveling for official work and had to stay for two nights. we chose the hotel s it was on a great deal . At the time of check in we didn't like the room but the staff at front office Nam and Fah were very helpful and helped us moving to a better room . it was very prompt and no hassle . The breakfast at the restaurant had great choice and very fresh food . we are vegetarian so we couldn't eat much but for non veg eater its a great choice of menu at very nominal price.  The hotel also provided tuktuk ride up to BTS station with no extra charge.  Overall I will go back to stay because of very good service from the staff.

29.review_text: My review is a little-sided because of one issue but the hotel itself is really amazing.  My 3 stars are because I was counting on using the shuttle frequently but it sees to be "broken" more often than it is running.  Also, the pickup and drop-off rules change with every driver and every person answering the phone!  Meaning when you want to be dropped off at the bts station its okay....then when you come back they can't pick you up from the same place they dropped you off at????? Doesn't make sense to me.  They make you walk half way then they pick you up.  What is the point of having a shuttle then?  Other than that the location is fine.  If you want the red light environment its close enough to walk to.  If you want to avoid the red light then you can take 2 different routes.…

30.review_text: Pi pang and the rest of the hotel staff was helpful. The hotel was clean and sanitized. It was very convenient for me to my embassy and make it more easier. Good deal especially this time of the pandemic

31.review_text: Stayed here for 10 days. Originally I was only stopping for 2 days. The rooms are lovely. I stayed in the junior suite which is particularly spacious, with nice interior and comfortable beds and sofas.    Location is great! It's really easy to get out into every direction of Bangkok. It is central but in a really quite t peaceful area away from the footfall. It has wa tuk-tuk service with a lovely driver to drop you to the bts or high street.   Staff are lovely and helpful and have made my stay a nice one.  Nam on reception has been really helpful and friendly during my stay. 😊

32.review_text: The room was not too big or small so that made it cosy with a king size bed ,  great hot shower and some nice thick curtains to make absolutely certain each  morning would not bring to much light into the room to break my sleep. At reception I made  friends with a very charming and helpful receptionist called Nam who worked mostly nights. Always smiling and helpful she was both professional and just gorgeous at the same time. I think she must have been one of the reasons why i extended my stay at this lovely and affordable hotel. Oh yeah!, great location too .

33.review_text: Great value for money. All staff were extremely professional and very skilled in English. The rooms are neat and clean and well equipped with TV, mini bar, personal safe box and a large bathroom with an excellent shower. The Wi-Fi is fast. Breakfast buffet does not offer a wide selection but what is given is of excellent quality. I enjoyed Khun Tun's hospitality in the dining room. Keep up the good work guys, you are doing great :) I live in Phuket and often travel to BKK. I will certainly be back :)  Daniel van den Enden  Phuket

34.review_text: Everything is good  Since the receptionist  Asthayasai staff are good, friendly, and the rooms are clean, beautiful room, super private.  The younger staff are also very attentive.  Nong Pang and Nong Fah  And other people are very cute and friendly

35.review_text: I arrived at 9.30am after my flight was canceled and Pang from reception allowed me to check in straight away with no problems whatsoever. My second time staying here, the rooms are new and clean, great value for money at this location.

36.review_text: Magnificent location feels home, refreshing environment. Combination of hotel & staff amazing. Thanks for Nam, Joe, Peter, Pang made my stay comfortable. Even small things can make big things in life.

37.review_text: It's a good hotel, great location near public transport and shopping centre. The staff (Pang) very nice when im check in ealry she very polite to take care and offer some nice breakfast promotion before im check in.

38.review_text: Appreciate the staff!!! Nam, Peter, Pang, etc... Excellent, friendly, co-ordinating 24/7. Food, breakfast, books & a nice cozy place. Quiet & near to downtown. Walk down to BTS. A place to visit again!!!

39.review_text: Great location to stay!!! Budget price, awesome facilities, great front desk. hospitality & service. A free Tuk-Tuk service & a wonderful garden in the front yard. Friendly, accommodating. Appreciate.

40.review_text: The price of this place is tempting but the tricks attempted will cost you more. The management has no understanding of customer service. Loyal customer? Forget free upgrades... You're gonna find yourself defending extra charges. Beer, coke from fridge never used... Gonna take 3 conversations with receptionist to fight those charges.. Extend a day and book 19 instead of 18th? Be prepared to fork out an extra 400 baht. It doesn't matter if you have spent thousands of baht with the hotel. No appreciation! Sadly, management doesn't realize this behavior loses them thousands upon thousands of baht with following bookings. The place isn't perfect. Cockroaches, hit or miss room cleaning, pool not gonna bring one back here but for the price it was kind of appealing. Now I won't be…

41.review_text: وGood welcome and hospitality especially reception staff The rooms are clean spcail    thnx Pang. receptionist  On the transaction and cooperatio e staff were very approachable and helpful. The breakfast was good. They arranged for a taxi to pick us up from the airport and then back again at the end of our stay. The suite was very good with comfortable furniture and the bed was comfortable too. We would definitely stay here again.

42.review_text: I was stay this hotel great service  staff was also grateful staff Nam at reception  her was friendly  and speak English very good  morning wake up breakfast  was buffet  big menus  I was very happy stay here

43.review_text: I spent three short stays in this hotel last year and spent an extended stay here during the foreigner visa amnesty this year. It’s a great hotel with everything one needs: pool, gym, on-demand shuttle to BTS skytrain & main road, outdoor sunbathing lounge overlooking the city, a Thai massage salon and an excellent and superbly valued breakfast buffet selection.   There are a range of rooms suitable for long and short stays and it truly is incredible value money that you won’t find anywhere else in Bangkok for this standard of hotel. The location is great: it’s secluded and quiet but situated in the centre of Bangkok‘S sukhumvit - home to the nightlife and shopping malls so popular with tourists - and a ten minute walk from the lovely Lumphini park.  The staff are very friendly,…

44.review_text: Good location , pang was very helpful and accommodated me on an early check in. Hotel looks clean . 8 minute walk from nana station . Close to terminal 21 . Has a gym and pool . Lobby is comfortable  Thank you!

45.review_text: Just spent one night there for the first time, but will certainly be back nice rooms, staff friendly especially Nam the receptionist very pleasant and helpful with a nice smile, located just of soi4 nana, with free shuttle bus to sukhumvit which is only a 5 mins walk,

46.review_text: Hotel is nice and breakfast is just amazing. Stuff is super helpful, especially Nam. Great place to stay.  You have free transport to and from BTS. Rooms are tidy and new, smoking on the balcony is available.

47.review_text: Just far enough away from the mayhem of Nana but close enough to walk with ease.  Very nice - staff, buffet breakfast, rooms etc. A very pleasant hotel which is very good value for money and puts the rest of the Soi 4 hotels to shame.

48.review_text: From the first second I arrived I was greeted by a lovely lady called nam with the biggest smile and everything was so easy, rooms are big and quality everything you would expect from a quality hotel, but very cheap I was very impressed I live in jomtiem pattaya but when I am in Bangkok this is the only place I will stay staff amazing nothing is a problem man who took my bags to room also doubled up as shuttle driver to take you into town hotel may be tucked away a little but is on the best party street in Bangkok nana plaza

49.review_text: A little hidden gem located in the quiet area of soi 4, while conveniently being walking distance to all the bars and pubs. Rooms are spacious and clean, plus very friendly and helpful staff, especially Khun Nam.

50.review_text: Hotel is very good also near the Sukhumvit area everything is near room also clean have gym swimming pool everything is okk is very good Breakfast also very nice stall also good and have to send tuktuk also free Nam

51.review_text: Great place to stay  The person at front desk Nam was so amazing and help thank you for all your help great location Nam has severed me both of my stay that is why I recommend you to stay there the breakfast and price is the best value around

52.review_text: Stayed here again for the 15th time or so. This is a lovely hidden jewel of a hotel. Great staff, Good food. Friendly helpful services including a free Tuk Tuk ride whenever you want to the main Sukhumvit Road. The rooms are spacious, very well laid out and furnished. Private free parking is available and it is in a very quiet no problem area. The price is almost unbelievably low for such a quality hotel.  I hate to single out staff as all of them are so polite, helpful and friendly. But on my last visit I must make a special mention to Nam who was calm, helpful and very efficient when I turned up early. She was a joy to deal with.

53.review_text: Nam on the front disk is amazing, so helpful and happy.  Really nice hotel free Tuk Tuk to the station. One of the best value hotel I have stayed at in Thailand. It's so nice that I came back for a second visit.

54.review_text: Stayed here 2 nights and it's a basic 4 star with friendly helpful staff. The hotel is well situated in central Bangkok but not a place if you want nightlife. The room was large and clean. Good breakfast

55.review_text: One of the best hotels I stayed in Bangkok and the staff are very nice, especially Tun and Toom at the breakfast, they provide excellent service. The hotel have a Nice swimming pool and gym. I would definitely stay here again.

56.review_text: I stayed in Alt Nana Hotel for a few weeks in June during the quarantine situation here in Thailand. It was a great decision and I will be back in the future.  The hotel provides you with really good facilities like a pool and a gym ( which has a great set of options and a variety of weights for you gym buffs )  Nam, one of the friendly receptionists here, made my stay very pleasant along with the rest of the helpful Alt Nana Hotel staff.  They provide amenities like laundry services which is very convenient.  If you're looking for a place in the middle of Bangkok with good amenities I recommend for you to come here.  Thank you again, Derick

57.review_text: Wonderful check in ( helped by the very friendly & efficient Nam) .... room was a pleasant surprise—- large & clean ... the only drawback to the hotel could be for those who want the nightlife right outside

58.review_text: Wonderful service as always. I have stayed here many times over the last couple of years and Fah at the front desk was kind enough to upgrade me today upon my arrival. The location is off the beaten path, but Soi4 is within walking distant with many bars and eateries.

59.review_text: I tried 7 hotels in Bangkok but this one is the best. They had made quite reasonable package prices for the pandemic time what included the breakfast for rooms up to 50 sqm. Additionally they have a tuk tuk available to bring or collect guests cos the hotel is a 10 Minutes walk from the Sukhumvit main Street.  In difference to the other hotels this one was filled with life and people around the world. Now I got a room the 4th time within 3 Months and I will even come back.  A big thank you to the nice staff.

60.review_text: I went to the Hotel 2 times now. Very clean and quiet. Its close to the nightlife. The staff i talked to (nam, fah) was very friendly and helpful. They upgrated me to a suit. Thanks for the nice stay.

61.review_text: I had experience with Alt Hotel  since Covid Situation in Bkk . First time I spent 1 night with Alt but that's time I checked in before curfew last minute and a lot of bags but that time Staff up grade me to Junior Class cause I carry on a lot bag and staff need me comfortable in these hotel. in my point of view this hotel support you at all time without request from the client. until now I am spend time in these hotel cause Staff very warm welcome  and support you at all time. Include driver (Took Took) I think this hotel combine signature of Thailand and the hotel and two thing to become the best place in nana area. Dont miss it if you looking for a good hotel in Sukhumvit road. Alt Hotel is the best choice in these area. Thank you all staff for warm welcome.

62.review_text: We found this nice small hotel when the curfew had hit Bangkok. And what a pleasant surprice it was. Staff were all very helpful and speak english well. The manager was a nice guy too who took care of the customers well. We had a Junior Suite and it was great value for money.  At daytime you can relax at the small but nice swimingpool, and socialize with the other guests.  When evening came, we were seated outside the hotel where you could enjoy a cold beer. And our stay was made even better because there were so many nice people staying at the hotel. Many of them seems to be regular guests there, and all of them were very impressed with Alt Nana Hotel. We will definetly stay here again!

63.review_text: I am stuck in Thailand and I received a great deal for a long-stay at this hotel. A special thank you to boss Matt, beautiful and kind Fah, Pang, Mon, my brother Peter, Seng, Da, Pop, Lee, Oop (Siam), Chall, big man in the kitchen TunTun, Thinny, and the most love to SIEW! She took my broken backpack home and mended it for me. Kindness and caring is getting hard to find, but not at this hotel. God bless you all. 🇹🇭🇹🇭🙏🙏😎😎

64.review_text: Alt Hotel Nana has been a life savor.  I had no idea I would be here this long.  The hotel staff has been most accommodating. In particular Jida, Pang, Fab, Nam & Miew have all given exceptional service. Hotel shuttle service makes area travel convenient.

65.review_text: Good Services from every staff Here especialy the service from Jida and Nam. They give me free scan of my document. I am very appriciate that. And this hotel albo have good facilities such as swimming pool and fitness center.

66.review_text: Hotel is new and clean and located in the alley so it’s quite quiet away from busy nana area. Very easy access to BTS and food area. The staffs are very friendly and helpful. It’s our fourth stay here. We keep coming back😆 Pang and Jida, the staff, is very friendly and helpful. Also the cleaning ladies and shuttle bus drivers are very nice and polite. Will come back again.

67.review_text: Extended stay in Thailand due to Corona-virus. Very good location and price, I staid in a spacious 50sqm bedroom, the hotel has solid facilities.   Service from all the staff was very good, it is not located next to BTS but hotel provides shuttle

68.review_text: I checked in to the hotel on March 17, 2020, and have been here for 50 days and counting. The reason for my extended stay is Thailand’s lockdown, but the situation for me has been made enjoyable by the excellent and professional staff of ALT Hotel | Nana to include but not limited to the deck staff Nam and Jida who speak perfect English. The House keeping staff are extremely friendly, as is all of the hotel staff, and keep the hotel extremely clean. The hotel is located apparently one kilometer from Nana Plaza, and very near Nana BTS. The hotel provides a free Tuk Tuk ride to both locations until Mid-night. It’s May 9, 2020, and I plan to stay until June 9, 2020, so needless to say that I’m satisfied with the location and Hotel. Would definitely say at this hotel if I ever…

69.review_text: Great service from named Jida Nam Pang good location and facilities such as swimming pool and fitness center will comeback again I am very I’m pressed in this hotel great chance to come here gooddddddd

70.review_text: I have been here so many times. And everytime I am very impressed in the great service from the staff here named Jida Nam Pang. The best place in Bangkok to spend time. There are many facilities such as swimming pool and shuttle bus.

71.review_text: Enjoyed my stay here at the alt hotel, we had to extend it by a few weeks also. Had a good experience the staff were lovely, jida, nam and pang were very friendly. Highly recommend the hotel. I enjoyed our stay thoroughly and they had a good price of the hotel too.

72.review_text: I have been here for 2 weeks. I am very impressed in this hotel because of the  greatest pool in Bangkok. And staff have good service for me named Jida, Nam, Pang. I like this hotel so much. I will come back to stay here again.
